## deck loop

Output button presses to stdout and read commands from stdin until you press ctrl+c

### Synopsis

Output button presses to stdout and read commands from stdin until you press ctrl+c

```
deck loop [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for loop
```
